page.title: 08UNDULATING WORCS. (SQ.9)
page.content:
The area contained within this square is of a gently undulating nature with {mature hedgerows }and trees much in evidence.
It is sparsely populated and has the occasional cottage dotted around the lanes , two pairs of semi - detached houses , a {manor house }and a farm. Buildings are mostly constructed of brick with the odd one or two with white rendering.
{The soil} is generally of a sandy loam type and appears to be fairly fertile, as the main area is given over to farming of the {market garden}type , with crops of lettuce , runner beans and soft fruit.
